item.title: 通胀数据强化鲍威尔的 "长期偏高 "观点
item.description: 周五公布的最新通胀数据巩固了美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔上周发出的信息，即高利率暂时不会改变。【原文：Fresh inflation data released Friday cemented the message from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell last week that high interest rates are here to stay for now.】

item.title: 红鸟国际传媒集团（RedBird IMI）将在英国禁令后启动《电讯报》的销售工作
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，红鸟国际投资公司（RedBird IMI）将放弃对《每日电讯报》的收购，此举很可能引发英国报业集团的又一场竞购战。【原文：RedBird IMI is set to walk away from its takeover of the Telegraph, according to a person familiar with the matter, in a move likely to trigger another bidding war for the UK newspaper group.】

item.title: 美国 IPO "焦土年 "的结束取决于利率下降
item.description: 越来越多的公司开始涌入重新焕发活力的首次公开募股市场，如果美联储最终不再在降息问题上踌躇不前，那么这一趋势可能会有更大的发展空间。【原文：Companies are increasingly piling into a re-energized market for initial public offerings, and if the Federal Reserve finally stops punting on interest rate cuts, the trend may have room to run.】

item.title: 市政监管机构警告购买 "建设美国 "债券的风险
item.description: 市政债券市场监管机构向投资者发出警告，提醒他们注意购买 "建设美国债券"（Build America Bonds）的风险，这些债券的交易价格超过 1 美元 100 美分，随着政府越来越多地通过再融资回购这些债券，购买者将面临潜在的损失。【原文：The municipal-bond market’s regulator issued a warning to investors about the risks of buying Build America Bonds that are trading at more than 100 cents on the dollar, which exposes buyers to potential losses as governments increasingly buy them back under refinancings.】

item.title: 巴西 XP 公司任命新财务总监，计划对董事会进行调整
item.description: 巴西最大的经纪公司之一 XP Inc. 周五发表声明，任命维克多-曼苏尔（Victor Mansur）为新任首席财务官，并将选举四名新的独立董事进入董事会。【原文：XP Inc., one of Brazil’s largest brokerage firms, appointed Victor Mansur as its new chief financial officer and will elect four new independent directors to its board, according to a Friday statement.】

item.title: Adnoc 收购伊拉克石油，计划出口价格更高的原油
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国石油巨头阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：United Arab Emirates oil giant Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. imported a crude oil cargo in a rare move after upgrading its only refinery, which will allow it to sell more of its own higher-value barrels.】

item.title: Eskom 预计南非因发电量稳定而减少电力削减
item.description: 南非电力公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 预测，由于发电性能提高，在即将到来的冬季需求增加的月份里，南非的停电现象将有所减少。【原文：South Africa’s power utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. forecast reduced blackouts for the country during upcoming winter months, when demand increases, due to improved electricity generation performance.】

item.title: 日本 Jera 公司寻求投资中东氢能项目
item.description: 日本最大的公用事业公司 Jera Co. 正在寻求在中东投资低碳氢气和合成氨项目，此外还将购买这些项目的产出。【原文：Japan’s biggest utility, Jera Co., is looking to invest in low-carbon hydrogen and ammonia projects in the Middle East, in addition to buying their output.】

item.title: 英国监察机构在受到批评后加倍实施 "点名羞辱 "计划
item.description: 英国金融监管机构回击了对其计划的批评，该机构计划在早期阶段点名调查公司，并认为这将提高透明度和威慑力。【原文：The UK’s financial watchdog pushed back against criticism of its plan to name firms it’s investigating at an early stage, which it thinks will boost transparency and deterrence.】

item.title: 派普桑德勒聘用杰富瑞金融科技银行家 Freiman 和 Greene
item.description: 派博桑德勒公司从杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Piper Sandler Cos. hired Rob Freiman and Kegan Greene from Jefferies Financial Group Inc. as managing directors on its technology investment banking team.】

item.title: 伦敦矿业王冠面临盎格鲁 390 亿美元收购的威胁
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）试图吞并英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc），这是对伦敦股市最受青睐的板块之一的最新威胁，此前有猜测称，大宗商品领域的其他巨头也可能放弃在英国上市。【原文：BHP Group’s attempt to swallow up Anglo American Plc is the latest threat to one of the London stock market’s most-prized sectors, following speculation that other big names in the commodities space could ditch their UK listings.】

item.title: 南非兰特飙升，稳定联盟的可能性上升
item.description: 一项民意调查显示，在下个月的全国大选中出现一个对市场有利的联盟的可能性增大，兰特汇率因此创下了今年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：The rand strengthened by the most this year after publication of an opinion poll that boosted the odds of a market-friendly coalition emerging from national elections next month.】

item.title: PCE 通胀数据符合预期，国债收益率下降
item.description: 在美联储首选的通胀指标基本符合预期后，美国国债上涨，使基准收益率从 11 月以来的最高点回落。【原文：US Treasuries rose, sending benchmark yields down from the highest since November, after the Federal Reserve’s preferred gauge of inflation came largely in line with expectations.】

item.title: 汇丰银行因迪士尼电影融资丑闻赢得 13 亿英镑诉讼
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）在伦敦法院成功击退了一群投资者就华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc successfully fought off a London court claim brought by a group of investors in a £1.3 billion ($1.6 billion) lawsuit over tax breaks linked to Walt Disney Co. film financing.】

item.title: 国航将以 110 亿美元购买 100 架国产 C919 飞机
item.description: 中国国际航空公司将购买 100 架 Comac C919 喷气式飞机，按挂牌价计算，价值 108 亿美元。【原文：Air China will buy 100 Comac C919 jets in a deal valued at $10.8 billion based on list prices, giving a boost to the home-grown challenger to Airbus SE and Boeing Co.】

item.title: 英国男子因亲俄袭击被控违反新安全法
item.description: 根据一项新的国家安全法，几名英国男子因支持俄罗斯纵火袭击一家与乌克兰有关联的企业而受到指控。【原文：Several British men were charged under a new national security law for supporting Russia by carrying out an arson attack on a Ukraine-linked business.】

item.title: 激进分子埃利奥特增持 10 亿美元英美资源集团股份
item.description: 知情人士称，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已在英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）建立了约 10 亿美元的股份，在拒绝了澳大利亚必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd. ）的收购之后，这家英国上市矿商面临的压力更大了。【原文：Elliott Investment Management has built a roughly $1 billion stake in Anglo American Plc, people with knowledge of the matter said, adding to the pressure on the UK-listed miner after it rejected a takeover approach from Australia’s BHP Group Ltd.】

item.title: 投资者向 SVB 的 Husk 索要数十亿美元。监管机构为何拒绝付款
item.description: 去年硅谷银行倒闭后尘埃尚未落定，精明的投资者就开始根据政府匆忙撰写的新闻稿排队等候巨额赔付。【原文：The dust had barely settled after Silicon Valley Bank’s collapse last year when savvy investors began lining up for a big payout, based on a hastily written government press release.】

item.title: 尼日利亚计划设立 100 亿美元的侨民基金以吸引美元流入
item.description: 尼日利亚正计划设立一个 100 亿美元的侨民基金，以吸引侨居海外的尼日利亚公民投资，支持包括基础设施、医疗保健和教育在内的关键部门，从而实现经济增长。【原文：Nigeria is planning to set up a $10 billion diaspora fund to attract investment from its citizens living abroad to support critical sectors including infrastructure, health care and education to grow the economy.】

item.title: 绿色柴油原料进口飙升扰乱美国大豆市场
item.description: 美国用于生物燃料生产的废食用油和其他原料的进口激增正在侵蚀大豆加工商的利润，迫使他们放慢脚步并危及扩张计划。【原文：A surge in imports of used cooking oil and other ingredients for biofuel production in the US is eroding profits for soybean processors, forcing them to slow down and jeopardizing expansion plans.】

item.title: 沙特首都审查城市战略，削减人口目标
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯首都在重新配置旨在支持王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）耗资数万亿美元的王国经济多元化议程的计划时，将放弃到 2030 年使人口翻一番的目标。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s capital is set to pull back on its target to double its population by 2030 as it reconfigures plans designed to support Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s multi-trillion dollar agenda to diversify the kingdom’s economy.】

item.title: 乌克兰天然气供应风险再次成为关注焦点
item.description:
本周，来自俄罗斯的输油管道流量将持续到 2024 年的预期受到打击。【原文：

Expectations that pipeline flows from Russia will continue past 2024 took a hit this week.

】

item.title: 坠毁的影子船队油轮的西方保险无效
item.description: 一艘 "影子船队 "油轮在丹麦的重要海峡坠毁，它出示的一套保险文件无效，这是一个鲜明的例子，说明如果这艘船发生重大灾难，谁来买单并不明确。【原文：A shadow-fleet oil tanker that crashed in Denmark’s vital straits produced a set of insurance documents that weren’t valid, a stark example of how there’s little clarity about who would pay the bill if such a ship had a major disaster.】

item.title: 埃克森首席财务官表示，预计美国联邦贸易委员会将在年中批准先锋公司的交易
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）预计，尽管政府加强了对企业兼并的审查，但美国反垄断监管机构仍将在 6 月底前批准该公司以 600 亿美元收购先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. expects US antitrust regulators to approve its $60 billion acquisition of Pioneer Natural Resources Co. by the end of June despite increased government scrutiny of corporate mergers.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在微软（Microsoft）和 Alphabet 取得强劲收益后，股市期货走高。今天晚些时候，埃克森石油公司（Exxon）和雪佛龙公司（Chevron）的业绩以及可能预示美联储利率走向的美国关键通胀数据将成为关注焦点。交易员们还在猜测日本是否会进行干预以支撑日元。【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are pointing higher after strong earnings from Microsoft and Alphabet. Attention is turning to results from Exxon and Chevron later today and key US inflation data that may signal the trajectory of Fed rates. Traders are also speculating as to whether Japan will intervene to support the Yen.】

item.title: 汽车制造商马鲁蒂铃木因销量增加而实现超预期利润
item.description: 印度最大的汽车制造商马鲁蒂铃木印度有限公司（Maruti Suzuki India Ltd.）公布的季度利润好于预期，原因是运动型多用途车带动了销量增长，原材料成本也有所下降。【原文：Maruti Suzuki India Ltd., India’s largest carmaker, reported better-than-expected quarterly profit boosted as sports utility vehicles led an increase in sales and raw material costs eased.】

item.title: 欧盟以新数字规则打击快时尚巨头 Shein
item.description: 快时尚公司 Shein 已被纳入欧盟旨在打击网上非法和有害内容的旗舰规则的管辖范围。【原文：Fast-fashion firm Shein has been drawn under the scope of flagship European Union rules designed to clamp down on illegal and harmful content online.】

item.title: 花旗和摩根大通认为，随着美联储鹰派态度的蔓延，套利交易也将复苏
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Emerging-market currencies will be attractive for carry traders as hawkishness has been spreading from the Federal Reserve to many developing central banks, according to strategists from Citigroup Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co.】
